name: swagger-page
description: A swagger page for daily api doc development

scripts.release-server: BABEL_ENV=server babel webpack.config.server.js -o webpack.config.server.gen.js &&  BABEL_ENV=server-webpack webpack -p --config=./webpack.config.server.gen.js
scripts.run-server: BABEL_ENV=server babel webpack.config.server.js -o webpack.config.server.gen.js && BABEL_ENV=server-webpack webpack  -p --config=./webpack.config.server.gen.js && node ./dist/server/server.js

author: linxray@gmail.com
